title: New Justia AI Writer Feature
description: In addition to drafting pages with Justia AI Writer, you may now generate freeform content for any page on your site according to your own custom instructions. On the Elevate platform, edit any existing page or create a new page, click the + icon to add a new block to the page content and select Justia AI Writer. Enter your prompt and you're off to the races!
Click here for a how-to on how to add this block to a page.
Need help with creating the prompt? View our help article here.
